Class MainApp

java.lang.Object
MainApp
public class MainApp extends Object
Main application class for the Shapeville geometry learning game. This class manages the main window, user interface, scoring system, and level progression. It provides an interactive educational environment for learning geometric concepts.
Since:
2025
